text: showing tips of bright green new growth
its resinous scent more pronounced in the warming air
unfurling tender new needles or scales
developing small, inconspicuous male cones releasing pollen
notes: For species that have this trait

text: young female cones beginning to form, often reddish or purplish
notes: For species that have this trait

text: the tree appears refreshed and vibrant after winter dormancy
birdsong echoing from its boughs as nesting season begins
dew clinging to its needles in the cool spring mornings
